PLUGIN_XSQUEEZEDISPLAY
	EN	XSqueeze

PLUGIN_XSQUEEZEDISPLAY_DESC
	EN	XBMC Now playing information on a Squeezebox display

PLUGIN_XSQUEEZEDISPLAY_XBMCIP
	EN	XBMC IP Address

PLUGIN_XSQUEEZEDISPLAY_XBMCIP_DESC
	EN	Enter the IP address of the XBMC machine you want the plugin to monitor

PLUGIN_XSQUEEZEDISPLAY_XBMJSONPORT
	EN	XBMC JSON Port

PLUGIN_XSQUEEZEDISPLAY_XBMCJSONPORT_DESC
	EN	Enter the JSON port of the XBMC machine you want the plugin to monitor (normally )

PLUGIN_XSQUEEZEDISPLAY_XBMCJSONUSER
	EN	XBMC JSON Username

PLUGIN_XSQUEEZEDISPLAY_XBMCJSONUSER_DESC
	EN	Enter the username for the XBMC JSON interface

PLUGIN_XSQUEEZEDISPLAY_XBMCJSONPASSWORD
	EN	XBMC JSON Password

PLUGIN_XSQUEEZEDISPLAY_XBMCJSONPASSWORD
	EN	Enter the password for the XBMC JSON interface
